data.message:
First, thanks to the Facebook team..I lived far from my family and Facebook helps me to keep these relationship alive..!
I need some help from you and I do not know where to send my request:I am a web master for a page of a School in France (IFPC) and we lost the admin role of our page (accidental deletions by one of the teacher at school). Could you tell me at which email I can submit our request to help us with that matter ? Kind regards. Michel Lamy

replies.message: Hi Michel. We're glad you're able to stay connected! If the Page is unmanaged, you'll see Unofficial Page below the cover photo. You can then request to claim the Page and become the admin, or merge the Page into a Page you already manage for your business: http://bit.ly/2n8aMIV. However, if the Page is managed, you won't see the option to claim it. If this is the case, you can report the Page: http://bit.ly/2nGPLRN. -Jessica
Facebook Is anybody there!!!! I too had my other account closed like the others above. I replied with verification and received NO ANSWER !!
Thanks a lot for your quick answer. I'll follow your procedure. Greeting. Michel
Sue Hollar did you ever get help with your issue? i am having the same problem as you :(
